QuestData.Title: Moving Mirrors
QuestData.Description:
What sort of horrific trap is this? The Light is being reflected directly on her!
Simone's a dear friend of mine! Free her from that thing, please!
QuestData.LogDescription: Redirect the mirror fragments to free Simone.
QuestData.RewardText:
Denathrius may not have set the mirrors, but it's his fault I am here.
Those that rouse his suspicion are sent here to suffer, even once loyal servants like myself.
